## üìù Description

Knockout Coins adds a fun reward mechanic to **Bully** ‚Äî whenever an NPC is knocked out, they have a configurable chance to drop coins you can pick up.  
Works regardless of _how_ they‚Äôre knocked out ‚Äî bare fists, melee weapon, slingshot, or even other NPCs!

Supports:

- **Bully: Scholarship Edition (PC)**
- **Bully: Anniversary Edition (Mobile)**
- **Bully: PS2**

## üìú Changelog

### v1.0.0 ‚Äî Initial Release

- Added coin drop system for all NPCs on knockout.
- Configurable drop chance, pickup radius, and bobbing behavior.
- Works seamlessly across SE, AE, and PS2 editions.
